pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulate and Visualize Kendall Random Walks and Related Distributions // Kendall random walks are a continuous-space Markov chains generated by the Kendall generalized convolution. This package provides tools for simulating these random walks and studying distributions related to them. For more information about Kendall random walks see Jasiulis-Godyn (2014) arXiv:1412.0220.
